Title: 🔁🖼 ⚡️ 14 STRIKE UAVS KILLED ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖ On September 17, 2024, t...
Description: Forwarded From Commander of the Military Forces Mikola Oleshchuk⚡️ 14 STRIKE UAVs KILLED➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖On September 17, 2024, the Russian military was hit by a winged missile -I Skander-K- from Sumi (launches from Voronezk region - Russian Federation .) and 14 attack UAVs of the -Shahed type from the regions of Primorsko-Akhtarsk, Yeisk, Kursk - Russian Federation.💥 All 14 Shaheds were killed by mobile armed groups of the Ukrainian Defense Forces, aviation, anti-aircraft missiles and by means of the REB Airborne Forces. The anti-violent defense took place in the Mykolayiv, Cherkassy, ​​Poltava, Dnipropetrovsk, Zaporizhzhya and Kiev regions. For the combat work!🇺🇦 Together - to victory!➖➖➖➖➖➖ ➖➖➖➖🦅 Commander of the Military Forces, Lieutenant General Mykola Oleshchuk
